attributes.action: Domestic violence perpetrators to tell people when getting into new relationship
attributes.additional_details: I believe too many people are a victim to domestic violence by someone that has a repeat past of this. Why should someone be beaten or be a subject of death due to a violent person in a relationship? I think there should be a law that domestic violence perpetrators should have to be open and honest, like a sex offenders has to, before getting into a relationship with that person.
attributes.background: Make domestic violence perpetrators the same as sex offenders how they have to tell the person they are getting involved with. I don’t believe that a person should have to suffer being beaten before they find out that the other person has a past of repeat offences

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330960
